name: GunRacer
description:
Shoot fast, don't miss, get better

This game will put your speed and precision to the test.
Shoot all targets as fast as you can.
Familiarize yourself with each stage.
Improve your times and unlock new cool guns.
Try to plan your approach and experiment to get best results.

Currently have 20 stages and 7 pistols.
I hope you'll like it.

If you would support the project, that would help me to put the game on Steam where it would still be for free.
Also putting game on Steam would enable me to add leaderboards, where you could compare your times with friends and the world.

Install instructions

1 - Un-zip the file.

2 - Open "GunRacer.exe"

3 - Enjoy...
